title: Spot Workplace Discrimination Patterns with AI
author: Ludwig
readme:
![Spot Workplace Discrimination Patterns with AI.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Spot_Workplace_Discrimination_Patterns_with_AI_214c3fa3ce.png)

## How It Works:

• Scrapes company review data from Glassdoor using ScrapingBee.  
• Extracts demographic-based ratings using AI-powered text analysis.  
• Calculates workplace disparities with statistical measures like z-scores, effect sizes, and p-values.  
• Generates visualizations (scatter plots, bar charts) to highlight patterns of discrimination or bias.

### Example Visualizations:

![twilio_effect_size.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/twilio_effect_size_c6e44eabe5.png)![twilio_scatter_plot.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/twilio_scatter_plot_30e3aebd38.png)

## Set Up Steps:

_Estimated time: ~20 minutes._  
• Replace ScrapingBee and OpenAI credentials with your own.  
• Input the company name you want to analyze (best results with large U.S.-based organizations).  
• Run the workflow and review the AI-generated insights and visual reports.

This workflow empowers users to identify potential workplace discrimination trends, helping advocate for greater equity and accountability.

#### Additional Credit: [Wes Medford](https://medium.com/@wryanmedford/an-open-letter-to-twilios-leadership-f06f661ecfb4)

For algorithms and inspiration
readme_zh:
![用AI识别职场歧视模式.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Spot_Workplace_Discrimination_Patterns_with_AI_214c3fa3ce.png)

## 工作原理:

• 通过ScrapingBee抓取Glassdoor上的公司评价数据  
• 运用AI文本分析提取基于人口统计的评分  
• 采用z分数、效应量和p值等统计方法计算职场差异  
• 生成散点图、柱状图等可视化图表突显歧视或偏见模式  

### 示例图表:

![twilio效应量分析.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/twilio_effect_size_c6e44eabe5.png)![twilio散点图.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/twilio_scatter_plot_30e3aebd38.png)

## 配置步骤:

_预计耗时:约20分钟_  
• 替换ScrapingBee和OpenAI的凭证为您自己的账号  
• 输入待分析的公司名称（美国大型企业效果最佳）  
• 运行工作流并查看AI生成的洞察与可视化报告  

该工作流能帮助用户识别潜在的职场歧视趋势，为促进公平问责提供数据支持。

#### 特别鸣谢: [韦斯·梅德福](https://medium.com/@wryanmedford/an-open-letter-to-twilios-leadership-f06f661ecfb4)  
提供算法灵感与启发
